Parameters: View: The view whose bounds have changed.
int: The new value of the view's left property.
int: The new value of the view's top property.
int: The new value of the view's right property.
int: The new value of the view's bottom property.
int: The previous value of the view's left property.
int: The previous value of the view's top property.
int: The previous value of the view's right property.
int: The previous value of the view's bottom property.
onLayoutChange(android.view.View,int,int.Description: Called when the layout bounds of a view changes due to layout processing.
onLayoutChange(android.view.View,int,int.FullName: public abstract void onLayoutChange (View v, int left, int top, int right, int bottom, int oldLeft, int oldTop, int oldRight, int oldBottom)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the layout bounds of a view changes due to layout processing.
